ad_text: Justin Sturgill Trucking Sponsored Local Haul - Full Time Year Round Work Located in the Cleves/Miamtown Ohio area. Call or Text: 513-706-0686 for more information Those who should apply: Should be willing to work and show up. Must have your CDL (Class A or B) Must have Clean Driving Record Training will be provided. **We do not provide CDL training or are able to hire those with temporary licenses** Plentiful benefit package includes: Health insurance, dental, vision and life insurance as well as 401k Savings plan with company match. Paid vacation after one year of service. Pay is based on percentage of the truck. FULL-TIME · CLEVES, OHIO Dump Truck Driver Apply now
